Class CompanyRepController

Object
CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends Object
controller that manages company representative related functions includes internship creation, modification, visibility, registration, application review and filtered retrieval

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepController

      public CompanyRepController(InternshipRepository internshipRepo, InternshipAppRepository internshipAppRepo, UserRepository userRepo, CompanyRepository companyRepo)
      create controller with required repository dependencies
      Parameters:
      internshipRepo - repository storing internships
      internshipAppRepo - repository storing internship applications
      userRepo - repository storing system users
      companyRepo - repository storing companies

  • Method Details

    • createInternship

      public Internship createInternship(String title, String desc, Internship.Level level, String major, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, CompanyRepresentative cr, int slots, boolean visibility)
      create new internship posting assigned to a company representative
      Parameters:
      title - internship title
      desc - internship description
      level - level of internship
      major - preferred student major
      startDate - application open date
      endDate - application close date
      cr - company representative owning internship
      slots - maximum available slots (1-10)
      visibility - whether internship is visible to others
      Returns:
      created internship instance

    • getInternshipsByCompanyRep

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsByCompanyRep(CompanyRepresentative rep)
      retrieve internships created by selected company representative
      Parameters:
      rep - company representative owner
      Returns:
      list of owned internships

    • getInternshipApplications

      public List<InternshipApplication> getInternshipApplications(String internshipId)
      retrieve all applications submitted for specified internship
      Parameters:
      internshipId - targeted internship identifier
      Returns:
      list of related internship applications

    • approveApplication

      public void approveApplication(InternshipApplication internshipApplication, Internship internship)
      approve pending application if internship is valid and has remaining capacity
      Parameters:
      internshipApplication - targeted application entry
      internship - internship to which application belongs
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if invalid state or full capacity

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(InternshipApplication internshipApplication)
      reject a pending internship application
      Parameters:
      internshipApplication - targeted application entry
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if application already resolved

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(Internship internship, boolean isVisible)
      update internship visibility state
      Parameters:
      internship - internship to modify
      isVisible - new visibility state

    • registerRep

      public CompanyRepresentative registerRep(String name, String email, Company company, String dept, String position)
      register company representative using predefined company instance
      Parameters:
      name - representative name
      email - representative email/login id
      company - company assigned
      dept - department assigned
      position - job position
      Returns:
      created company representative
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if email already registered

    • register

      public CompanyRepresentative register(String name, String email, String companyName, String dept, String position)
      register company representative by company name lookup or creation
      Parameters:
      name - representative name
      email - representative login id
      companyName - company association
      dept - department assigned
      position - role position
      Returns:
      created representative instance
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if email already exists

    • getOwnInternshipsFiltered

      public List<Internship> getOwnInternshipsFiltered(CompanyRepresentative rep, InternshipFilter filter)
      retrieve representative-owned internships after filtering rules applied
      Parameters:
      rep - owner requesting list
      filter - filtering options
      Returns:
      sorted filtered internship list

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(Internship internship, String title, String desc, Internship.Level level, String major, LocalDate start, LocalDate end, int slots)
      update internship details if pending approval
      Parameters:
      internship - internship to be modified
      title - new title (ignored if null)
      desc - new description (ignored if null)
      level - new level (ignored if null)
      major - new preferred major (ignored if null)
      start - new start date (ignored if null)
      end - new end date (ignored if null)
      slots - new slot count (ignored if invalid input: '<'= 0)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if internship cannot be modified

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(Internship internship)
      permanently delete internship if still pending
      Parameters:
      internship - internship entry to remove
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if internship is already evaluated

    • getInternshipById

      public Internship getInternshipById(String internshipId)
      retrieve internship instance using identifier
      Parameters:
      internshipId - id value used to locate internship
      Returns:
      internship if exists, null otherwise

    • getStudentById

      public Student getStudentById(String studentId)
      retrieve student instance using identifier
      Parameters:
      studentId - id value used to locate student
      Returns:
      student if exists, null otherwise
